channel.title: (((( GamePure V1 )))) //////Progress 46.7%\\\\\\
channel.description:
[[b]EDIT:[/b] im making new trading parde,skills and pk"s, i will change 2 dragon places to]
Hey guys im back with an another development. I have been very busy today with:
Barrows New home NPC's Shops Drops
Im doing now on:
New edge pk Looking if everything is correct in shops.
So i will give you a little preview. I have made today a new barrow minigame. I have own made it. But i have need 1 help topic. Just 1 for object tele. In shops have made a new barrows reward shop. But he doesnt work :S I have made walking npc's with no glitch. And editing the new home :) I have bring the shops to home. I have let 3 shops in the normal shop center. But now i have made it a trade parade.
And again i have some nice pics (better Quailty)
New Home: [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/7678/server1n.png[/img] Training. [img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/7048/server2.png[/img] Trade Parade [[b]EDIT:[/b] i will take it to another place]: [img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/2116/server3.png[/img] New Edge PK [m making on it]: [img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/6881/server4.png[/img] Barrow Minigame: [img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/699/server5.png[/img] Skills [dont believe te text]: [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/7632/server6.png[/img] Shops: [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/7830/server7.png[/img] Coming Soon: [img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/9725/server8.png[/img]
Extra: [img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/3727/server8.jpg[/img]
Maybe you think, why do you have a great progress so fast ? Well i have worked hard on some things. And i have finnaly connection with my friends. I mean my server can be online. But im only 46 % that isnt much. I think i will need work 1 or 2 weeks. (every day 2-3 hour) I think my server is compleet. But only to get online. Not to download. Now i hope you enjoy my review.
Credits: 35% to me (for coding and editing) 40% to base (Reapagescape v2) 15% to tutorials and the one's who helped me. 10 % to some tools

item.description:
@roli wrote:

[EDIT: im making new trading parde,skills and pk"s, i will change 2 dragon places to]

Hey guys im back with an another development.
I have been very busy today with:

Barrows
New home
NPC’s
Shops
Drops

Im doing now on:

New edge pk
Looking if everything is correct in shops.

So i will give you a little preview.
I have made today a new barrow minigame.
I have own made it.
But i have need 1 help topic.
Just 1 for object tele.
In shops have made a new barrows reward shop.
But he doesnt work :S
I have made walking npc’s with no glitch.
And editing the new home
I have bring the shops to home.
I have let 3 shops in the normal shop center.

Maybe you think, why do you have a great progress so fast ?
Well i have worked hard on some things.
And i have finnaly connection with my friends.
I mean my server can be online.
But im only 46 % that isnt much.
I think i will need work 1 or 2 weeks. (every day 2-3 hour)
I think my server is compleet.
But only to get online.
Not to download.
Now i hope you enjoy my review.
